Articles.Content:
As a part of GnS Project team i want to introduce you a grand playthrough of KSP in Career mode.

We have a lot of of mods: USI Colonization, K+, Remote Tech, kOS and many other to make game harder and more interesting. The goal is - to bring kerbalkind into space, have fun and try to kill as few kerbals as possible.

link to the channel: [https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiLo3TgqXIl84eZLFZrxmvA](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiLo3TgqXIl84eZLFZrxmvA)

e-mail: [\[email protected\]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#90f7fee3bee3e0f1f3f5d0f7fdf1f9fcbef3fffd)

Playlist with all series

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/videoseries?list=PL_qry52bIXml2RP72MyeIdclOneDSSyqW" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

If you see any flaw, whatever it is, in video itself, or heavy English mistakes- please, write it here or send via e-mail. We are interested in quality no less than you

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-04T20:10:15Z" title="06/04/2015 08:10  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 4, 2015</time> by Shpiler**

The second episode added.

More science, first orbit, probes, unmanned Mun flyby, Tito Kerman as a first space tourist

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/y-Ofp0OF9GQ?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
